sentences: Shawn Michael McDonald (born September 4, 1977) is a Contemporary Christian music (CCM) singer, songwriter and guitarist.
Simply Nothing marked his debut in 2004, followed by a handful of live releases and studio efforts.
Shawn McDonald first married in 2005, having a son Cohen and divorced in 2010.
Shawn Micheal McDonald married Marisha Breanne Richter August 1, 2015 in Kansas City Kansas.
